title: pongum Or paravasha
sahitya:
pongum Or paravasha pErinbam peruvAr tanga ratham vITra pazhani daNDAyudanaik-kaNDOr


anupallavi

  tangaL kuraiyellAm tangAmal maraindODa angavanai vaNangum aDiyAr anaivarumE


caraNam    kaN koLLAk-kATSi adai kaNDOrin uLLattai kavarndavarai vATTum kavalaiyai OTTi viDum
aNNal avaniDam aDaikkalam aDaiyum anbar anaivarin tunbam anaittum tIra
